Title: Introducing Agent HQ mission control | GitHub
Author: GitHub
Description:
The power of GitHub’s Agent HQ comes from mission control, a unified command center that follows you wherever you work. It’s not a single destination; it’s a consistent interface across GitHub, Visual Studio Code, GitHub Mobile, and the CLI that lets you direct, monitor, and manage every AI-driven task.

With mission control, you can choose from a fleet of agents, assign them work in parallel, and track their progress from any device.

#GitHubCopilot #AgentHQ #GitHub

About GitHub: It’s where over 100 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
